TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JumpTask extends System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem

summary.span: 表示某应用程序在 Windows 7 任务栏跳转列表中的快捷方式。

span.span: Represents a shortcut to an application in the Windows 7 taskbar Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将视为应用程序的快捷方式。A can be thought of as a shortcut to an application. 通过设置属性来指定可执行文件的路径。You specify the path to the executable file by setting the property. 如果未设置, 则隐含当前正在运行的进程的路径。If the is not set, the path of the current running process is implied. 您可以选择指定在启动时传递到应用程序。You can optionally specify to pass to the application at startup. 你可以设置基本显示属性, 如、 和 , 以指定任务在跳转列表中的外观。You can set basic display properties, such as , , and to specify the appearance of the task in the Jump List. 与一起使用的图标必须作为本机资源提供。An icon used with a must be available as a native resource. 如果 DLL 或可执行文件中有多个图标资源, 则可以通过指示属性中的偏移量来指定要使用的图标资源。If multiple icon resources are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the property. 默认情况下, 将放置在 "跳转列表" 的 "**任务**" 类别中。By default, a will be placed in the **Tasks** category of the Jump List. 可以通过设置属性来指定自定义任务分组。You can specify custom grouping of tasks by setting the property. 可以通过创建未指定和的来直观地分隔跳转列表中的项。You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a that does not have a and specified. 此项为空将在跳转列表中显示为水平线。This empty will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List. 在这种情况下, 可以设置其他属性, 但它们不会有任何影响。In this case, other properties can be set, but they will not have any effect. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在标记中声明。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 在记事本应用程序中`readme.txt` 打开一个名为的文本文件。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下面的示例演示如何在代码中配置。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 打开计算器应用程序。The opens the Calculator application. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#241](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#241)]

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the application.
The path to the application.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定属性, 则暗示当前正在运行的进程的路径。 If the property is not specified, then the path of the current running process is implied. 应用程序可以包含其自身之外的可执行文件的任务。An application can contain tasks for executables other than itself. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在标记中声明。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 在记事本应用程序中`readme.txt` 打开一个名为的文本文件。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下面的示例演示如何在代码中配置。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 打开计算器应用程序。The opens the Calculator application. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#241](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#241)]

summary.span: 获取或设置嵌入在资源中的图标的索引，索引从零开始。

span.span: Gets or sets the zero-based index of an icon embedded in a resource.

value.span: 图标的从零开始的索引；如果未使用图标，则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the icon, or -1 if no icon is used.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与一起使用的图标必须作为本机资源提供。An icon used with a must be available as a native resource. 如果 DLL 或可执行文件中有多个图标, 则可以通过指示属性中的偏移量来指定要使用的图标。If multiple icons are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the property. 如果未指定图标资源, 或者如果找不到指定的图标, 则显示标准系统图标。If no icon resource is specified, or if the specified icon is not found, the standard system icon is displayed. 若要指定不显示图标, 请将属性设置为-1。To specify that no icon is displayed, set the property to -1. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在标记中声明。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 在记事本应用程序中`readme.txt` 打开一个名为的文本文件。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)]

span.span: Gets or sets the path to a resource that contains the icon to display in the Jump List.

value.span: 包含图标的资源的路径。

span.span: The path to a resource that contains the icon.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与一起使用的图标必须作为本机资源提供。An icon used with a must be available as a native resource. 如果 DLL 或可执行文件中有多个图标, 则可以通过指示属性中的偏移量来指定要使用的图标。If multiple icons are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the property. 如果未指定图标资源, 或者如果找不到指定的图标, 则显示标准系统图标。If no icon resource is specified, or if the specified icon is not found, the standard system icon is displayed. 若要指定不显示图标, 请将属性设置为-1。To specify that no icon is displayed, set the property to -1. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在标记中声明。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 在记事本应用程序中`readme.txt` 打开一个名为的文本文件。The opens a text file named `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下面的示例演示如何在代码中配置。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 打开计算器应用程序。The opens the Calculator application. summary.span: 获取或设置针对跳转列表中的任务显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the task in the Jump List.

value.span: 针对跳转列表中的任务显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed for the task in the Jump List.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 必须将属性设置为, 以使作为可单击任务出现在 "跳转列表" 中。Typically, the property must be set for the to appear in the Jump List as a clickable task. 或者, 您可以通过创建未指定和的来直观地分隔跳转列表中的项。Alternatively, you can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a that does not have a and specified. 此项为空将在跳转列表中显示为水平线。This empty will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List. 在这种情况下, 可以设置其他属性, 但它们不会有任何影响。In this case, other properties can be set, but they will not have any effect. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在标记中声明。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 在记事本应用程序中`readme.txt` 打开一个文本文件名称。The opens a text file name `readme.txt` in the Notepad application. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#002](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#002)] 下面的示例演示如何在代码中配置。The following example shows how to configure a in code. 打开计算器应用程序。The opens the Calculator application.
